38 WMAdmitance::WMAdmitance()
39 {
40  // Retrieve joint names configuration
41  aAdmitanceNode.getParam("sara_admitance/joint_names", aJointNames);
42 
43  // Set callback for dynamic reconfiguration
44  aDynamicConfigServer.setCallback(boost::bind(&WMAdmitance::dynamicReconfigureCallback, this, _1));
45 
46  // Retrieve link names for each joint
47  std::vector<std::string> lLinkNames;
48  for (const std::string& lJointName : aJointNames)
49  {
50  std::vector<std::string> lLinkName;
51  aAdmitanceNode.getParam("sara_admitance/" + lJointName, lLinkName);
52  lLinkNames.emplace_back(std::move(lLinkName[0]));
53  }
54 
55  // Create unique instance of gravity model
56  aGravityModel = std::make_unique<WMGravityModel>(lLinkNames, 7);
57 
58  // Create discrete Transfer function
59  TransferFunctionCoefficient lFunctionCoeff;
60  lFunctionCoeff.aNumeratorFactor = Eigen::ArrayXXd::Zero(aJointNames.size(), 2 + 1);
61  lFunctionCoeff.aDenominatorFactor = Eigen::ArrayXXd::Zero(aJointNames.size(), 2);
62 
63  for (int i = 0; i < aJointNames.size(); i++)
64  {
65  lFunctionCoeff.aDenominatorFactor.row(i) << -1.970052211604768, 0.970446261452074;
66  lFunctionCoeff.aNumeratorFactor.row(i) << 0.004925623091321, 0.009851246182642, 0.004925623091321;
67  }
68 
69  aDiscreteTF = std::make_unique<DiscreteTransferFunction>(
70  aJointNames.size(),
71  std::move(lFunctionCoeff),
72  2);
73 
74  // Initialize public admitance velocity
75  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
76  {
77  aAdmitanceVelocityMap.emplace(lJointName, 0.0f);
78  }
79 
80  // Subscribe to the joint_state to obtain current efforts applied on joints
81  aJointStateSub = aAdmitanceNode.subscribe("joint_states", 1, &WMAdmitance::jointStateCallback, this);
82 }
83 
88 WMAdmitance* WMAdmitance::getInstance()
89 {
90  WMAdmitance* lInstance = aInstance.load(std::memory_order_acquire);
91  if (!lInstance)
92  {
93  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lLock(aMutex);
94  lInstance = aInstance.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
95  if(!lInstance)
96  {
97  lInstance = new WMAdmitance();
98  aInstance.store(lInstance, std::memory_order_release);
99  }
100  }
101  return lInstance;
102 }
103 
109 double WMAdmitance::getAdmitanceVelocityFromJoint(const std::string& pJointName) const
110 {
111  double lVelocity = 0.0f;
112  const auto& lIter = aAdmitanceVelocityMap.find(pJointName);
113  if (lIter != aAdmitanceVelocityMap.end())
114  {
115  lVelocity = lIter->second;
116  }
117  return lVelocity;
118 }
119 
126 void WMAdmitance::process()
127 {
128  if (isAdmitanceEnabled())
129  {
130  std::vector<double> lAdmitanceTorque =
131  calculateAdmitanceTorque(aGravityModel->process());
132 
133  updateAdmitanceVelocity(
134  aDiscreteTF->updateVector(Eigen::Map<Eigen::VectorXd>(lAdmitanceTorque.data(), lAdmitanceTorque.size())));
135 
136  if (aVerboseMode)
137  {
138  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
139  {
140  ROS_INFO("Velocity of %s: %lf", lJointName.c_str(), getAdmitanceVelocityFromJoint(lJointName));
141  }
142  }
143  }
144 }
145 
155 void WMAdmitance::jointStateCallback(const sensor_msgs::JointState& pMsg)
156 {
157  if (!aFirstCheck)
158  {
159  aFirstCheck = true;
160  for (const auto& lMapItem : aAdmitanceVelocityMap)
161  {
162  bool lJointNamePresent = false;
163  for (const auto& lJointName : pMsg.name)
164  {
165  if (lMapItem.first == lJointName)
166  {
167  lJointNamePresent = true;
168  break;
169  }
170  }
171 
172  if (!lJointNamePresent)
173  {
174  ROS_ERROR("WMAdmitance: Joint '%s' is not present in topic /joint_states.", lMapItem.first.c_str());
175  throw std::runtime_error("WMAdmitance: Joint '" + lMapItem.first + "' is not present in topic /joint_states.");
176  }
177  }
178  }
179  else
180  {
181  aJointState = pMsg;
182  }
183 }
184 
192 void WMAdmitance::dynamicReconfigureCallback(sara_admitance::sara_admitanceConfig &pConfig)
193 {
194  aEnableAdmitance = pConfig.enable_admitance;
195  aVerboseMode = pConfig.verbose_mode;
196 }
197 
202 void WMAdmitance::updateAdmitanceVelocity(const std::vector<double>& pAdmitanceVelocity)
203 {
204  size_t lIndex = 0;
205  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
206  {
207  aAdmitanceVelocityMap[lJointName] = pAdmitanceVelocity[lIndex];
208  ++lIndex;
209  }
210 }
211 
217 std::vector<double> WMAdmitance::calculateAdmitanceTorque(const std::vector<double>& pCompensatedTorque)
218 {
219  size_t lIndex = 0;
220  std::vector<double> lAdmitanceTorque;
221  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
222  {
223  lAdmitanceTorque.emplace_back(getEffortFromJoint(lJointName) - pCompensatedTorque[lIndex]);
224  ++lIndex;
225  }
226  return lAdmitanceTorque;
227 }
228 
234 double WMAdmitance::getEffortFromJoint(const std::string& pJointName) const
235 {
236  size_t lIndex = 0;
237  double lEffort = 0.0f;
238  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointState.name)
239  {
240  if (lJointName == pJointName)
241  {
242  lEffort = aJointState.effort[lIndex];
243  break;
244  }
245  ++lIndex;
246  }
247 }
